i18n.quest.create.desc.waterWheelFeature: The §n§5Water Wheel§r is one of the most basic ways of generating rotational force. You can hook up multiple wheels by placing them next to each other.
You can also change the appearance by using different Wooden Logs on them!
i18n.quest.create.desc.weightedEjector: The §n§5Weighted Ejector§r can launch items or entities to a selected location.
i18n.quest.create.desc.welcome.2: Create is an immersive tech mod, bringing realism into Minecraft on a whole new level!
i18n.quest.create.desc.welcome.3: If you have doubts about any blocks or items, hold W to ponder and see an amazing 3D in-game wiki!
i18n.quest.create.desc.windmill: Combine with §n§5Radial Chassis§r to create a very powerful windmill that has high stress capacity.
i18n.quest.create.mainIngredient: This will be the main ingredient for most of this mod's items and blocks.
i18n.quest.enchant.book: Vanilla Max is just the start
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.Soul_deep: Like an improved §4Hellshelf§r, the §9Soul Touched Deepshelf§r gives a lot of §cQuanta§r, it does give higher §aEterna§r max to §a37.5§r though! Which means better Enchants!
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.Soul_sculk: Suprisingly you don't need infusion for these! You just need to kill the most powerful boss in vanilla Minecraft! The §9Skulk shelves§r increase §aEterna§r to §a40§r which will allow us to Infuse the next item.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.alexandria: The Library of Alexandria is a better Enchantment Library. It can hold more, that's it. you need to Infuse a Enchantment Library. It needs exactly §a50 Eterna§r, between §c45%%-50%% Quanta§r, and §5100%% Arcana§r. This can be done with §97 Echoing Skulkshelves§r and §d2 Draconic Shelves§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.arcana: §5Arcana§r is very important quantity, it increases the amount of Enchantments you get and makes rare Enchantments more common. An example would be like with Swords, smite is a very common enchantment but looting is much more rare. §5Arcanas§r default is §50%%§r and max is §5100%%§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.blazing: The §4Blazing Hellshelf§r is an upgrade to the §4Infused Hellshelf§r. It increases max §aEterna§r to §a30§r. The negative Enchanting Clue makes it a little worse for normal Enchanting, instead we can use it for better Infusion.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.book: Bookshelves are your starting point, but definitely not your end point. Atleast not normal bookshelves. With only normal bookshelves you can only get §aEterna§r up and to a max of 15. (I will explain the Enchantment Levels soon but just know you need them up)
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.charms: Charms are new parts with Apotheosis that allows you to get Potion Effects for much longer. You can Infuse them to make them Unbreakable. It needs §a50 Eterna§r, between §c8.5%%§r and §c13.5%% Quanta§r, and between §532.5%%§r to §537.5%% Arcana§r. One way you can do this is with §d5 Draconic Endshelves§r, §46 Glowing Hellshelves§r, §41 Blazing Hellshelves§r, §b1 Heart-Forged Seashelf§r, and 2 Melonshelves. {BTW I used any curios charm tag so some items that can be used in the quest can not be made Unbreakable, only Apotheosis Charms can.)
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.crystalline: The §bCrystalline Seashelf§r is an upgrade to the §bInfused Seashelf§r. It's very good for normal Enchantments but doesn't give us enough §5Arcana§r for the next Infusion we'll need. Still good stats for normal Enchanting though!
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.deepshelf: The §9Deepshelf§r (not dormant) is your next step to Enchanting. Like everything else it needs Infusion. The §9Deepshelf§r needs 30 §aEterna§r, §c40%% Quanta§r, and §540%% Arcana§r. You can get that with §45 Blazing Hellshelves§r and §b4 Heart-Forged Seashelves§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.draconic: The §dDraconic Shelf§r is the last Shelf we'll need for perfect set up. It might only give §aEterna§r but it has the Max Max §aEterna§r of §a50§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.echo_deep: A little expensive but the §9Echoing Deep Shelf§r is like a much better §bSeashelf§r. (BTW you'll need to kill quite a few wardens to advance more in Enchanting... shoulda warned you earlier). Also increases Max §aEterna§r to §a37.5§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.echo_sculk: You might need to kill a few Wardens for these but that's okay Apotheosis makes it easier! This shelf is mostly for §5Arcana§r but it's a good source for all quantities. It will be needed for next Infusion.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.enchant: Enchanting gets a few changes with Apotheosis. To summarize it, 15 bookshelves won't be enough now. There's new bookshelves and actions you can do with Enchantment Tables now and hopefully these quests will help you understand.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.endshelf: The last sets of Shelves you'll need are §dEndshelves§r, to get them you need Infused Dragon's Breath. This one was hard to get but you need atleast §a40%% Eterna§r, §c15%%-25%% Quanta§r, and atleast §560%% Arcana§r. It has to be between §c15%%-25%% Quanta§r to get that you can try §99 Echoing Skulkshelves§r and 4 Melonshelves or §92 Echoing Skulkshelves§r and §b10 Heart-Forged Seashelves§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.eterna: §aEterna§r sets the Enchantment Level which determines what Enchantments you can or will get. It's default is §a0§r and max is §a50§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.glowing: The §4Glowing Hellshelf§r is an upgrade to the §4Infused Hellshelf§r. It also increases the Max §aEterna§r but it's not the stats we're looking for in order to Enchant. Definitely good for normal Enchanting though!
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.heart-forged: The §bHeart-Forged Seashelf§r is another upgrade to the §bInfused Seashelf§r. It's a little expensive but gives the §5Arcana§r we'll need for Infusion and later Enchanting. The negative §eRectification§r makes it a little worse for normal Enchanting though as it's important for getting good Enchantments.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.hellshelf: §4Hellshelves§r are your introduction to §cQuanta§r, they give §c3%% Quanta§r and §a1.5 Eterna§r. Better than normal shelves right? You're going to need atleast 6 of them for the next step.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.infused_hellshel: In order to get higher Max Enchantments and levels you'll need Infused Hellshelves. To get them you will need §a22.5 Eterna§r and §c30%% Quanta§r. The best way to get that would be 15 normal shelves and §45 Hellshelves§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.infused_seashelf: If you want higher §aEterna§r and §5Arcana§r you'll need Infused Seashelves. To get them you need atleast §a22.5 Eterna§r, §c15%% Quanta§r, and §510%% Arcana§r. The best way to get that is 15 Bookshelves and §b5 Seashelves§r. (§c15%% Quanta§r is default you won't need §4Hellshelves§r for this).
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.infusion: Infusion is a special version of Enchanting which ironically is used for better enchantments. When the right amount of §aEterna§r, §cQuanta§r, and §5Arcana§r is reached the enchantments will offer Infusion. (To know the Levels needed you can check JEI or follow these Quests)
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.library: This is arguably one of the most important blocks added by Apotheosis, the Enchantment Library. You put Books in and they collect over time and can be taken out anytime. Warning 1. It has limits, high limits but limits 2. It can only take out the highest level put in regardless of how many are in.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.negative: Some infusions need very very exact amounts of §aEterna§r, §cQuanta§r, or §5Arcana§r to get these you might need one of these shelves. Each lowers the amount of its respective amounts.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.other: It's not just bookshelves that can be Infused!
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.pearlescent: The §dPearlescent Endshelf§r is the best all-around shelf. It also gives a Max §aEterna§r of §a45§r, but this isn't the shelf we're looking for to get perfect set up.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.perfect: Ever want THE most perfect Enchants? Then this is the setup you need, for 100%% everything. §95 Echoing Skulkshelves§r, §95 Soul-Touched Sculkshelves§r, and §d1 Draconic Shelf§r will get you §a50 Eterna§r, §c100%% Quanta§r, §5100%% Arcana§r and §96 Enchanting Clues§r. §e3 Shelves of End Fused Rectification§r will give §e100%% Rectification§r. And §6Deepshelf of Arcane Treasures§r will top it all off with §6Treasure Enchantments§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.quanta: §cQuanta§r sets how random the Enchants you get will be. It can be used against you though depending on §eRectification§r. If the §cQuanta§r is high and §eRectification§r is low, you're more likely to get bad enchantments and curses. Default §cQuanta 15%%§r and its max is §c100%%§r. §eRectification§r default is §e0%%§r and max is §e100%%§r.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.retification: §eRectification§r is a quantity that works with §cQuanta§r, it determines if the enchantments will be good or bad. The more §eRectification§r the better the Enchantments. Definitely necessary for those wanting good gear.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.seashelf: §bSeashelves§r are your introduction to §5Arcana§r, they give §52%% Arcana§r and §a1.5 Eterna§r. Better than normal shelves right? You're going to need atleast 6 of them for the next step.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.sight: You ever spend 3 months studying Galatic Code to finally understand Enchantment Table language just for it to be gibberish? No? Me either but §9Enchanting Clues§r are your actual translator for it. Each §9Enchanting Clue§r will tell you 1 Enchantment before you actually use it.
i18n.quest.enchant.desc.trident: Apotheosis knows how annoying Tridents can be to get so they made it easier... well kinda easier. You can now make an Inert Trident and Infuse it to get a normal Trident. The Trident requires between §a20-30 Eterna§r, §c20%%-50%% Quanta§r, and atleast §535%% Arcana§r. You can get this with §94 Echoing Skulkshelves§r or §b2 Crystalline Seashelves§r and §b6 Heart-Forged Seashelves§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodCleanup.1: Did a mob hit the floor too hard and get its §cBlood§r everywhere? Oh no!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodCleanup.3: You can use a §cSanguinary Pedestal§r to absorb that precious §cBlood§r for later use!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodCleanup.4: Want to automate collecting blood? Place a §9Spiked Plate§r on top of the Pedestal, then have a mob stand on it.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodExtractor: To start collecting blood, we need to craft the §cBlood Extractor§r.
As long as you have this in your inventory, killing mobs will collect blood into the extractor. §cBlood§r is an important resource in EvilCraft.
Need to increase the storage of the Extractor? Simply make another, and then combine them in a crafting grid!
These can also be used to extract blood from §cBlood Stains§r you find (or create) on the ground.
Lastly, with enough blood stored, you can sneak-right click on the ground to place a bucket of blood down.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodInfuser.1: We won't be creating Dark Power Gems using pools of blood anymore.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodInfuser.2: Instead, we can make the §9Blood Infuser§r to do all of the messy work for us. This allows you to directly infuse items with blood!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodInfuser.3: These can be upgraded using §6Promises§r as well. This is one of the main machines used for progression!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.bloodInfusionC: Combining §aHardened Blood Shards§r with §9Dark Power Gems§r will make Blood Infusion Cores.
§9Blood Infusion Cores§r are the main crafting components of several machines in EvilCraft.
§dBrooms§r can be made using Broom Parts. Every Broom is made up of 3 parts: a Rod, a Cap, and a Brush.
Each part can be crafted by combing the bare part with certain items to give them specific modifiers. As there are too many modifiers to type out, make sure to check the guide book for more info!
To craft your Broom, simply place each part into the crafting table. The Broom will require Blood to function properly.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.captureSpirits: While their §dEssence§r is useful, we can also capture these Spirits for later use. That sounds evil, doesn't it?

To become a Spirit Hunter, you'll need to create the §dVengeance Focus§r first. This is used to §aFreeze Spirits§r in place, then you place a §9Box of Eternal Closure§r near the Spirit. This will then suck the Spirit in for later use.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.colossalBloodC: Is the §cBlood Chest§r not working fast enough? Do you have too many items that need to be repaired? You can make a §cColossal Blood Chest§r to solve these problems.

To build one, you need to make 25 §9Reinforced Undead Planks§r. Using these, you want to make a 3x3x3 hollow cube, then place a §cColossal Blood Chest§r block to close off the multiblock structure. If done right, you'll have a massive §cBlood Chest§r you can now use. Some might call is colossal.
This also allows you to upgrade it using §6Promises§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.createMobEgg.1: Want to create a mob egg from the spirit you have trapped in that box?
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.createMobEgg.2: The §9Spirit Reanimator§r does exactly that. Give it a lot of §cBlood§r and an egg, and of course a §9Box of Eternal Closure§r with the Spirit you want to create the mob egg from, and it will attempt to create the mob egg!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.createMobEgg.3: Note: Some mobs cannot be used to create eggs.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkPowerGem.1: To progress, we'll need to create our first §5Dark Power Gem§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkPowerGem.2: To do this, you'll need to collect at least 5 buckets worth of blood in your §aBlood Extractor§r. Once collected, make a hole with at least 5 blocks of space, and then fill it with the blood.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkPowerGem.3: Once you've created your pool of blood, toss in a §9Dark Gem§r to infuse it.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkTanks.1: Using the power of §9Dark Gems§r, we can create §aDark Tanks§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkTanks.2: These can store 16 buckets of any liquid you want, but you'll probably need this for all of the §cBlood§r you'll be collecting.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkTanks.3: Need it to hold more? Just combine it in a crafting grid with another Dark Tank.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkTemple.1: These are hard to miss, considering they have a massive beam coming from the center.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkTemple.2: In the center of the §9Dark Temple§r is a §aEnvironmental Accumulator§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.darkTemple.3: We can use this to empower and create several items that we'll need along the way, including §dLightning Bombs§r!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.dryingBlood.1: If you leave a bucket of blood on the ground long enough, it will dry into §cHardened Blood§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.dryingBlood.2: Aside from being incredibly unsanitary, we need all kinds of blood for us to progress. Even dried blood.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.dryingBlood.3: This will turn back into blood in the rain, or by breaking it with regular tools. If you break it with §9Flint and Steel§r, you'll get §dBlood Shards§r instead.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.entangledChali: The §6Entangled Chalice§r is just like an Ender Tank.
When placed in the world, it can pump in Blood. When activated in your inventory, it will try to fill up your items that use §cBlood§r as a resource.
If you want to make more Chalices using the same network, just use the crafting recipe that uses a Chalice instead of a gold ingot.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.environmentalA: With §dGarmonbozia§r, we can now create our own §aEnvironmental Accumulator§r. That's a lot to type out, I'm gonna be honest.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.fortunePickaxe: It's a pickaxe with Fortune V on it. That's all.
Definitely won't summon spirits when you are mining. §oDefinitely won't.§r
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.garmonboziaCre: Using the power of a slain §9Vengeance Spirit§r, we can use the Blood Infuser to create §dGarmonbozia§r.
This is §dPain§r and §dSorrow§r materialized. It's also the high-end crafting material for powerful tools and items in EvilCraft.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.infiniteFoodSo: Either with the flesh of §aPlayers§r or §dWerewolves§r, you can create an §aInfinite Food Source§r using the power of Garmonbozia!
When it's raining, throwing in a §aWeather Container§r will harness the power of the rain.
With this, you can create an §9Infinite Water Bucket§r, or an §9Infinite Water Source Block§r. These are both incredibly useful items to have!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.kineticatorFea: The §9Kineticator§r works like a magnet for items and experience.
The §eReverse Kineticator§r will instead repel items and experience.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.maceCharge: Holding right click will charge up the Mace to do an AoE attack using §cBlood§r. Sneak-right clicking will change the power level. The higher the power level, the more damage it will do at a higher cost of Blood.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.maceExplosion: Works like the §aMace of Distortion§r, except it causes an AoE explosion instead.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.mobFarm.2: To start this, you'll need to craft at least 33 §cDark Blood Bricks§r. With these, we'll build a structure that is strong enough to contain the summoned spirits.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.mobFarm.3: You'll also need a spirit trapped in a §9Box of Eternal Closure§r. This will determine the drops you'll get.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.mobFarm.4: To build this, you need to build a cuboid structure with enough room for the mob to spawn. The minimum size is 3x4x3, which has enough room to spawn mobs like zombies. Make sure to place a §9Spirit Furnace§r on one of the faces so you can interact with the structure.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.mobFarm.5: If you want to spawn bigger mobs, you'll need to make a bigger structure.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.modIntro.1: §cEvilCraft§r is a magic mod based on somewhat evil things. Collect the blood of your enemies and harness the power of an ancient source of evil!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.modIntro.2: Everything in this mod can be found in the guidebook, the §aOrigins of Darkness§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.modIntro.3: To get started, find yourself some §9Dark Gems§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.primedPendant: To insert the desired potion, just right click with the §2Primed Pendant§r in hand to open its inventory.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.removeEnchantm: Need to remove §dEnchantments§r from an item you've found? Maybe you want to remove a Curse? This can be done using the §cPurifier§r.
To do this, first place at least 3 buckets worth of blood into the Purifier, then throw in the item you want to remove an enchantment from.
Next, add in the §cBlook§r. The Blook will absorb one of the enchants from the item, and convert it into a book of the enchant.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.repairWithBloo: The §cBlood Chest§r can be used to repair items using §cBlood§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.shovelWeapon.1: Have you ever wanted to be able to attack things with a Shovel, and it hurt? I would ask why, but this is EvilCraft.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.shovelWeapon.2: Well look no further! This serves as both a weapon, and a tool for breaking soft things!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.speedBoost: Gives you a speed boost + step height!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.thunderstormPo: When it's a thunderstorm, throwing in a §aWeather Container§r into the §aEnvironmental Accumulator§r will harness the power of the storm.
Using this, we can create items that allow us to control Lightning at will.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.undeadSaplings: Using the Blood Infuser, you can create §cUndead Saplings§r that grow into §dUndead Trees§r.
The logs and planks are useful for creating several tools and items within EvilCraft.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.uniqueDrop.1: This is a unique drop from §aPlayers§r, including when you die!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.uniqueDrop.2: You §ocould§r get this by dying over and over, or by participating in PvP. Same thing!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.upgradeBloodIn: EvilCraft machines can be upgraded using §6Promises§r. Each Promise will have different effects, but first, we'll want to upgrade our Blood Infuser to unlock more recipes.
To do this, we need to create a §6Promise of Tenacity: Tier 1§r. Generally, this just increases the storage capacity of a machine. For the Blood Infuser, this will unlock more recipes!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.veinSword.1: Need more blood from your enemies? Of course you do!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.veinSword.2: The §dVein Sword§r allows you to collect more blood, as well as more drops with Looting attached to it!
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.vengeanceSpiri: Sometimes when you kill a mob, a §dVengeance Spirit§r will spawn.
Their §dEssence§r seems to be useful in crafting more advanced items within EvilCraft.
Not finding many Spirits? Make a §9Vengeance Ring§r and toggle it on to attract more Spirits during your battles.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.desc.werewolfVillag: Within villages, there are §ointeresting§r villagers that just so happen to be §dWerewolves§r.
Slaying these beasts will give you §dWerewolf Flesh§r.
i18n.quest.evilcraft.subt.increaseEffici: Increases the Efficiency of EvilCraft Machines
i18n.quest.evilcraft.subt.increaseSpeed: Increase the Speed of EvilCraft Machines
i18n.quest.farm.animals: We're doing this the old fashioned way.
i18n.quest.farm.book: Making a Kitchen, with a book.
i18n.quest.farm.cake: You can have your Cake and Eat it too.
i18n.quest.farm.chicken: I'm not gonna make an Egg pun.
i18n.quest.farm.cookbook: Cooking with the power of Diamonds
i18n.quest.farm.desc.animals:
The classic Lead. Use this to get animals into your farm area.

This isn't the same thing found in paint.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.book: Go ahead. Put a book in a furnace.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.botany: Hopper pots will automatically output into the storage beneath it. This can be used to automate all of your crops!
i18n.quest.farm.desc.cabinet:
This works just like the kitchen counter, except in the air.

And you can't put things on top of it.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.cake: Time to bake a cake, if you've got some milk and eggs ready.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.chicken:
Chickens will lay these naturally. I guess it's not really considered naturally...

I guess the chickens are just getting... §oEggs-ercise!!!§r.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.cookbook:
Craft the next version of the book. I promise you, it's worth it.

I'll even give you a Diamond back.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.counter:
This block stores items for cooking.

You can also place other kitchen multi-block items on it, like toasters and a Cow in a Jar.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.cows: I don't wanna know how you got these.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.fish: But he usually closes by 5, so who cares.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.flax: §2Flax Seeds§r are a great way to get string in the early game!
i18n.quest.farm.desc.food:
Welcome to the Food and Farming chapter!

Here, you'll find different ways for you to grow and make food!
i18n.quest.farm.desc.fridge:
Stores items in the multi-block kitchen. Stack them on top of each other!

You can also shift-right click on it to open then door, and you can just right click items right in.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.heat: Allows you to attach power to the Stove.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.jar:
This block produces milk over time, and enables milk recipes for the kitchen multi-block.

To get a cow in the jar, place the jar in a hole. Lure the cow to fall in said hole above the jar, then drop an anvil on it.

I have no clue what this glass is made of, but it's stronger than my relationship with Chicken.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.kitchen:
This block is part of a multi-block kitchen.

This will show you every recipe that is available to you with the food you have in your inventory, or stored in the kitchen multi-block.

You can finally create a nice kitchen in Minecraft.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.market:
Markets provide you with a villager than can sell you anything if you have the right amount of emeralds.

Spoiler: It's usually just 1 Emerald per item. BUT THEY HAVE EVERYTHING.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.milk:
Find a cow and Right Click it with a bucket.

Seriously, why no bulls?
i18n.quest.farm.desc.pot:
§9Botany Pots§r makes it easy to grow your resources!

These pots auto-grow almost anything you put into them, and can even be upgraded for automation!
i18n.quest.farm.desc.sink:
This block provides water to the multi-block kitchen.

It can also provide infinite water by pumping water out via cables or pipes.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.stove: This block enables smelting recipes in your kitchen multi-block!
i18n.quest.farm.desc.sugar: You should have everything you need already.
i18n.quest.farm.desc.wool: Let's gather some pieces of wool!
i18n.quest.farm.kitchen: THE BEST THING SINCE SLICED BREAD
i18n.quest.farm.milk: Find a cow. Milk the cow. Profit.
i18n.quest.farm.stove: Honey, there's a Furnace in the Kitchen
i18n.quest.farm.subt.book: Smelt a book. Totally won't catch on fire.
i18n.quest.farm.subt.cane: This grows to the sky now.
i18n.quest.farm.subt.cookbook: This is totally worth it btw
i18n.quest.farm.subt.egg: How else do you think Fried Chicken is made?
i18n.quest.farm.subt.farming: Just wait until you get machines for this.
i18n.quest.farm.subt.fridge: You'll open it, close it, then open it again, just because you're bored.
i18n.quest.farm.subt.jar: Phenomenal Milking Powers....Itty bitty living space.
i18n.quest.farm.subt.kitchen: Betty White was born before Sliced Bread
i18n.quest.farm.subt.market: The villager has more than one way to spawn
i18n.quest.farm.subt.milk: Why aren't there any bulls in the game?
i18n.quest.farm.subt.sink: Why Use 3 Block when 1 Block Do Trick
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.arca: Smelting down Arcane Crystals will give you Arcane Crystal Dust.
This is used for most of the items in the mod.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.aure: §dAureal Bottles§r can be found in loot chests, but they can also be crafted using Arcane Crystal Dust.
You can also generate Aureal with Arcane Crystal Obelisks.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.bloo: Blood is collected by crafting Test Tubes, then killing mobs with the Mystical Dagger.
Note: The Test Tube must be in your inventory when killing mobs.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.corr: Used to corrupt Souls and Runes. You'll need this for later.
If you throw down Dark Matter, then throw down Corrupti Dust, it'll create a Black Hole. Feed it small entities like Arrows or Experience Orbs, and it'll produce Xpetrified Orbs.
Killing passive mobs will increase your corruption. Killing §9Aureal Entities§r has a higher chance to increase your corruption.
Be careful! At higher levels of corruption, negative things will happen!
Making a Sanity Meter will give your UI an upgrade to show your total corruption, for those who want to hit new high scores and such.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.dark: You've probably already acquired some Darkstone, but we'll need it to craft the forge.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.deor: The §6Deorum Ingot§r is needed to continue your progression in the mod!
This is a very important crafting ingot used in a lot of recipes, plus it also makes some pretty blocks!
These can be planted to grow §6Deorum Nuggets§r.
To create one, you'll need to find Yellow Orchids.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.drac: The Scepter shoots out energy orbs when charged up with Right-Click. If a mob is hit, it'll strike it with lightning.
To create an Arcane Crystal Obelisk, place down an Arcane Polished Darkstone block, then place two Arcane Crystal Blocks on top of it.
Right-click with Mundabitur Dust and you'll create the obelisk.
When placed on a Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone block on the Hephaestus Forge structure, it will slowly generate Aureal over time.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.drag: This Dragon Egg is a cool decoration piece. That's pretty much it.
Combining a Dragon Head with a Mystical Dagger will give you §9Dragon Scales§r.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.edel: The §2Edelwood Bucket§r can store more than one bucket of liquid, and can also be used to capture small animals like chickens or squids.
You'll need the Permafrost enchant to use it to carry Lava.
Smelting §9Edelwood§r will give you Dark Matter.
You can make Black Holes with this.
Found within the Dark Forest biome, the Edelwood Tree looks like a small tree that has been chopped in half.
You'll need to break the branches off and collect the logs, as these are used for crafting various items within the mod.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.ench: To enchant items, you'll need Darkstone Pedestals placed around the Forge.
Make sure to place these on the Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.endC: Found randomly in loot chests from the End City.
When used, it grants 5 minutes of creative flight.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.eter: The §6Eternal Stella§r has 3 charges, and when right-clicked, can fully repair all of your items in your inventory.
The main purpose of it is to give the enchant §9Unbreakable§r to an item, which is done by combining it with a tool and an §dApply Item Modifier Smithing Template§r in a Smithing Table.
It can be used to give yourself experience, or used to make the Eternal Stella.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.forg: The Forge requires 4 different items to be powered: Aureal, Souls, Blood, and Experience.
To learn more about each, follow the corner quests!
This goes in the right side of the forge.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.gold: The Dragon Scale can be made into a Golden and Aquatic Dragon Scales.
These are mainly used to craft §dTyr Armor§r.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.heph: We'll be using all of that Darkstone to create the §dHephaestus Forge§r.
Once you have all of the blocks needed, you'll need to build the platform for the forge!
The 8 Chiseled Arcane Polished Darkstone blocks on the outer ring of the platform can be used for pedestals or Arcane Cryal Obelisks, with the last block being placed in the center of the platform.
On top of the center block, place a Smithing Table and sneak+right-click it with a piece of Mundabitur Dust to convert it to the Forge!
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.lens: The §9Lens of Veritatis§r is used to see Aureal entities.
These are entities that will grant Aureal when killed, but will also increase your corruption....
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.magi: Using this bone meal on Farmland will convert it to Magical Farmland.
Crops will produce double the output when grown on Magical Farmland.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.main: This is the main resource in the mod. Go out and mine some!
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.mort: Crafted with skulls, bones, and cloth, this armor is slightly stronger than Iron.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.mund: Using our Arcane Crystal Dust, we'll need to combine it with other dusts and powders to create §dMundabiter Dust§r.
This dust is used in several recipes, as well as activating the Hephaestus Forge.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.myst: The Mystical Dagger is used to break Dragon Heads down to Dragon Scales.
When used to kill mobs, it will fill §aTest Tubes§r with §cBlood§r.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.newA: Forbidden \\§\\ Arcanus adds new ways to get better armor, enchants, and more!
This magic-themed mod has amazing animations, as well as some overpowered items like the §6Eternal Stella§r.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.nipa: Have you seen the random floating island in the sky?
These have the Nipa plant on them. You can break these and replant them!
They produce Arcane Crystal Dust Specks over time, which can be used to create Arcane Crystal Dust.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.perf: To perform a ritual, place the ingredients on the Arcane Pedestals around the Forge.
You'll need a §9Blacksmith's Gavel§r to activate the ritual. To do this, right click on the Forge with the Gavel.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.quan: The §9Quantum Catcher§r is used to capture and transport mobs.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.soul: Souls are gathered by creating a §9Soul Extractor§r, and then using it on Soul Sand.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.spaw: Breaking spawners will now drop §9Spawner Scraps§r.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.stel: You'll find the Stella Arcanum ore deep underground.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.upgr: The §dHephaestus Forge§r can be upgraded into higher tiers using things like Spawner Scraps, Arcane Crystals, and more!
You'll need higher tiers to make some of the higher tier items, like the §aEternal Stella§r. Make sure to check out JEI for more info!
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.desc.xRay: This gives X-Ray vision for mobs, highlighting them from afar to make it easier to spot them.
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.leavesAoE: Leaves an AoE Cloud that damages living mobs
i18n.quest.forbiddenAndArcanus.useOnFarm: Use on Farmland to make it Magical!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.aceticAcidEnhan: Take that Acetic Acid and add more Ethylene and Oxygen, this time on §aProgram 3§r in a §eChemical Reactor§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.aceticAcidProdu: Oxygen + Ethylene on §aProgram 2§r in your §eChemical Reactor§r is one way to make Acetic Acid
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.acetone.1: You can use a §eFluid Heater§r or a §eDistillery§r on §aProgram 1§r to turn the §3Dissolved Calcium Acetate§r into §cAcetone§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.activeTransform: This is the reason why the Active Transformer is the best method of EU transmission using GT infrastructure.
Its ability to transmit §nMASSIVE§r Amperage around is unrivaled.
These are the pipes for the Active Transformer.
Again, they §0§lMUST§r§r be colored in order to function, and cannot make turns. You will need more Active Transformers to change directions of the laser.
§3Active Transformers§r are the most efficient way to transmit EU across Gregtech based Infrastructure.
There are some rules to making sure it will function.
1.) The pipes/laser can only travel in straight lines. You can use another §3Active Transformer§r to divert the Laser to a different direction.
2.) The pipes §0§lMUST§r§r be colored to function. This is accomplished by using the Gregtech Spray Can.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedBoilers: Eventually you'll want more steam than the single block boilers can provide. When that happens, make way for the Large Bronze Boiler!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedCompute: Craft a End Steel Exchanger to be used in the production of the GregStar.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedInducto: The Advanced Inductor! Keep updating those old recipes
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedLcr.1: Previously we made the Large Chemical Reactor. But that version does not have the ability to accept Parrallel Control Hatches.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedLcr.2: Well this version, the Advanced Large Chemical Reactor, can accept Parallel Control Hatchs, and now you can run Multiple processes at a time.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedLcr.3: This is going to change how we produce our Chem lines!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedMachine: As is the theme with these multiblocks, Having a machine that can process all of the programmed circuits all in one machine?! These machines really are a true advancement in helping to progress to the end!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedMixerSe: Back to that §bAdvanced Mixer§r but on a different §aProgram Circuit§r setting. As a reminder, you could make a new one just for §dProgram 2§r recipes
This time you'll need iron, nickel, and zinc dusts
You can make this with a combination of iron, nickel or invar, manganese, and chromium dusts in an §bAdvanced Mixer§r with a §aProgram Circuit§r setting
§eManganese dust§r is a byproduct of ore processing tungstate, spessartine, olivine, tantalite, pyrolusite, wulfenite, or scheelite
§cLooking ahead§r, I'd recommend processing tantalite and tungstate
§dChromium dust§r can be gained by ore processing chromite or ruby, both of which can also be further processed in an electrolyzer to get more chromium!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedSMDCapa: You'll smelt this and flatten it into §bFoils§r to make the delicate layers that comprise the §dAdvanced SMD Capacitor§r
If you're having a hard time finding §aIridium Ore§r, then you can work towards the §5Iridium Bee§r, or start on processing the §eRarest Metal Mixture§r from the §6PlatLine™§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedSMDResi: Before you were able to make 32 SMD Resistors at a time, and now it is down to 16 Advanced SMD Resistors
Is this really a boost? Yes! Mainly because you use fewer of the Advanced SMD Resistors, but also because the regular kind won't be usable forever...
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancedSMDTran: You'll need this for many things once you get to §cZPM§r, but for now we'll use it to make the §dAdvanced SMD Transistors§r and §6HPIC Wafers§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancement.1: I §dLuV§r how dedicated the previous tier is, to helping us advance through ZPM!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.advancement.2: Using some components we can already craft, and some new materials, we are able to make the casings which will surround the Fusion Reactor!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.afterQuantum: Now this is the future! We are making progress, and stepping towards the Unknown!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.agar: Agar is a Jelly-like substance consisting of polysaccharides.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.all: Liquid Helium Plasma. Ensure your processing lines are making enough Helium
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.allTheTools.1: Ores generate in veins at varying heights spaced apart by every 3 chunks
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.allTheTools.2: Ore veins are often comprised of 3 or more different ores
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.allTheTools.3: All GT Ore veins were moved to the Mining Dimension from every other dimension
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.alloyComplexity: As previously stated, alloys are going to continue to increase in complexity, as it should be expected.
But with this alloy specifically we can make some important components!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.alloySmelter.1: I hope you still have that alloy smelter handy!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.alloySmelter.2: Copper and Nickel together in an alloy smelter make cupronickel, which you'll need to create the Coils for the Electric Blast Furnace
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.alloySmelterUsa: The alloy smelter allows you to make alloys of various materials
It can also use casting molds to make materials into certain forms, like glass dust into a glass tube
The casting molds can be reused and swapped out depending on what you are making
When automating make sure you remove the casting mold from your pattern, also it can be helpful to make multiple of these so you do not need to manually swap molds around
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.aluminium.1: You can find raw aluminium in the End, and raw aluminum just about everywhere!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.aluminium.2: Alternatively, you can acquire aluminum by processing a variety of items like bauxite in an electrolyzer for example
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.aluminium.3: We can also generate aluminum passively in the clay line process
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.amalgamation: Mercury and Gold are highly attracted to each other. For this reason, Mercury is widely used to leech gold out of fine sands, or other materials which are rich in fine gold that is otherwise difficult to process out.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ammonia.1: You're going to need either §9Ammonia§r and a §aLarge Chemical Reactor§r or a lot of §bNitrogen Dioxide§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ammonia.2: Thankfully, Nitrogen Dioxide is easy to come by, all you need is an §6HV§r §eGas Collector§r in §3The End§r on §2Program 3§r, a §aVacuum Freezer§r at IV, and a §aDistillation Tower§r also at IV
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.amperage.1: Wires and cables are imperfect and lose some of the energy they transport in the form of heat
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.amperage.2: You can mitigate some of this loss by covering your wires in rubber to make cables
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.amperage.3: The exception here are superconductors! They have no energy loss
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.amps.1: This may have a lot of Amperage, but we are not interested in the power delivery.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.amps.2: We need this to craft a component. Im sure you got this one as well.
A copper ingot and 63mB of oxygen in your arc furnace will make an annealed copper ingot
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.annealingCopper: A little oxygen and some electricity and you can anneal copper
This will also allow you to break down old machines into ingot forms rather than dust like in the macerator
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.anotherLens.2: SoC stands for System on Chip
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.antimonyProcess: §aOre Process§r §cStibnite§r for a chance at Antimony
Put Stibnite dust through a §eCentrifuge§r for guaranteed Antimony
Antimony becomes incredibly important later on, so be sure to stock up and don't turn it all into soldering alloy!
Antimony Trioxide is needed for the Naq processing line.
I challenge you to keep the Antimony part of the processing line all housed within GregTech.
The mid-tier rubber! You probably won't use it for this, as you have access to the highest tier of rubber
Some recipes in the future do require specifically §9Silicone Rubber§r, which is why we made it
Silicon dust, water, methane, and chlorine combine in your §eChemical Reactor§r on §aProgram 2§r to make this
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.aquaRegia.1: §l§6Aqua Regia§r§r is a mixture of Concentrated Nitric Acid and Hydrochloric Acid, usually one part to three parts, respectively. The Mixture was given its name (literally "Royal Water") by alchemists because of its ability to dissovle §l§eGold§r§r.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.arcFurnaceUsage: This machine is going to see a lot of use, upgrading it is worth it to keep it processing recipes quickly
Consider making multiple of these to help process recipes in parallel
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.argonPlasma: Argon is a chemical element; it has symbol Ar and atomic number 18. It is in group 18 of the periodic table and is a noble gas. Argon is the third most abundant gas in Earth's atmosphere, at 0.934% (9340 ppmv)
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.arsenicFromReal: If you get lucky, you may find Realgar which can be turned into arsenic directly in a centrifuge
Cobaltite can be electrolyzed directly to get arsenic, but that's at MV. Also you'll get more arsenic for your cobaltite by making arsenic trioxide dust and electrolyzing that
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.arsenicProducti: Put that cobaltite dust with 3 buckets of oxygen in your Electric Blast Furnace to acquire Arsenic Trioxide dust
This also produces Cobalt Oxide and some Sulfur Dioxide which can be further processed to get some of that oxygen back
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.assemblerCrafti: You can use a GT Assembler or a regular crafting grid to make this. Since pattern space is precious, especially for the GT Assembler, perhaps a Crafter or Molecular Assembler can handle putting it together
Swap out the LV Energy Hatches on your §eElectric Blast Furnace§r for these and your EBF can now process §6HV§r recipes!
Make sure you upgrade your power source too!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.assemblerUpgrad: Is it really time for an upgrade already? Well, yes it turns out
We need the §eAssembler§r at §1IV§r to make any of the §dAdvanced Surface Mount Devices§r (SMDs)
Use that §eExtractor§r to get your copper in a liquid state
Then put it all together in your §eAssembler§r!
Replace the Cupronickel Coils on your §aEBF§r with this stuff
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.assemblyLineNec: The Assembly line is necessary for crafting certain parts for the higher tiers. You will likely make quite a few Assembly lines, and maybe even run them in parallel.
Your Factory is really going to start filling out moving forward!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.atmStar.1: The Classic ATM Star. You should already be familiar with this, and I am sure you have a process to craft them down pat.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.atmStar.2: This is a breeze for you.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.automationAdvic: Rather than live in a crafting grid making plates and wires, it is often easier to automate these
§5Applied Energistics§r can handle this nicely when you set "Use Substitutions" to Yes
§eNote:§r If you find channels limiting, consider setting the channelmode to 4x or infinite with the following commands (you'll need OP on a server or cheats enabled on singleplayer)
§bRefined Storage§r struggles in this regard because it will not use the same tool twice due to NBT
An alternative here could be to set up your autocrafting in something like an §aRFTools Crafter§r
Automation is highly recommended, especially when we begin dealing with fluids

You can set §6LV+ Machines§r to automatically output back into a pattern provider, just be sure to toggle the "Allow Inputs from Output Side" setting in the GUI. Steam machines aren't smart enough to auto output, so you'll need something to §cimport§r back into the system for now
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bacteriaSolutio: You may want to avoid falling into the Bacteria Solution. You'll probably survive, assuming you don't have any open cuts...
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bacterialSludge: The Bacterial Sludge was added as an option. It's not necessary, as once you have Europium you don't need to use the Bacterial Sludge.
It was added since it's a quicker, and far cheaper product to make. Yes, you lose 20% chance on producing the Circuit, but at the savings of time and resources, it's well worth it!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bariumDust.1: §dBarium dust§r you can get by §eElectrolyzing§r §bBarite dust§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bariumDust.2: §dMercury§r can come from §eCentrifuging§r Redstone dust or Cinnabar dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bariumDust.3: In a bind for §dCalcium dust§r? You could always §eElectrolyze§r bone meal!
This wafer serves as the basis for all higher tier PIC wafers, you'll make very many of these in due time
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.batchCrafting.1: You've been remembering to batch craft things, right?
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.batchCrafting.2: I'll give you a pass this time and assume you have
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.benzene.1: Do you need more §0Benzene§r? You might try §aDistilling§r §6Severely-Steam Cracked Heavy Fuel§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.benzene.2: Running low on §0Benzene§r? A good source can come from §aDistilling§r §6Severely Steam Cracked Heavy Fuel§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.berylliumSource: Beryllium can be obtained many ways. Some of you may already have a good backstock of §2Beryllium§r from processing Enderpearl dust in an Electrolyzer.
This is a good way to obtain a decent amount of §2Beryllium§r, as well as other resources that are helpful and used in other recipies, such as Nitrogen Dioxide.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bestCasing: There is going to be a high demand for these plates. Figuring out how to supply yourself with a bunch of these plates may be a challenge, but well worth it.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bioChaff.1: Macerate those plant balls and make some bio chaff
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bioChaff.2: When automating this, make sure you set the output to only 2 bio chaff and not 4. The chance outputs will confuse the autocrafting setup otherwise
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.biomass.1: Biomass is useful for many things like ethanol and methanol production
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.biomassEthylene: We have already made a bunch of Biomass when we were first making our Ethylene.
So this should be old news, and hard to obtain.
While yes, its a bit cheaper in cost, in terms of the lower tier processors, its still a bit expensive.
Still 2:1 for this tier, but next tier will change that, and the LuV processor will become that much more affordable!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.blackHoleContro: With the strength of Unobtainium, it only makes sense that the GregStar would include some in the build.
There are no concerns of Structural Integrity at this point.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.blacklightsUV.1: Blacklights project light that is in the Ultra Violet spectrum. UV light just so happens to be Exceptional at sterilizing from bacteria and other contaminants.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.blueAlloyDust.1: Silver and 4 electrotine dust in a §eMixer§r on §aProgram 2§r will create §bBlue Alloy Dust§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.blueAlloyDust.2: You can just smelt this dust in a furnace to get the ingot
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.boilerOperation: Give the §eBoiler§r some §bwater§r, input a §6fuel source§r, watch it heat up, and it will start creating §7steam§r!
You could use any kind of water source, like a §dSink§r connected with a §aFluid Pipe§r from Pipez!
It is very important you put the water in first, as water piped into an already hot boiler will make the boiler §c§lexplode§r§r
A solid boiler uses solid fuels like coal, whereas the liquid boiler uses liquid fuels like lava.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.boilerUpgrade.1: Time to upgrade that boiler perhaps?
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.breadboards: And here I thought we'd be using breadboards
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.buckleUpForHV.1: Recipes that used the vacuum tube can now use this instead!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.buckleUpForHV.2: §eTip:§r You can search through all the different circuits in JEI by typing §b$circuits§r or even specific tiers of circuits with §b$circuits/ulv§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.bulkBlastChille: Now, with all those processing tasks being done by your new Rotary Hearth Furnace, you are going to need a multiblock that can keep up in cooling down your ingots.
Thats where the Bulk Blast Chiller comes into play!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cableLoss.1: When powering multiple machines, keep in mind cable loss!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cableVoltageDan: Giving a wire or cable too much voltage makes it burn out
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.canThisSupercom: The only MV machine that requires HV circuits to craft
This machine allows you to start working towards crafting the next tier of circuits, the §6microprocessors!§r
The minimum size is 5x5x5 and the maximum size is 15x15x15, and anywhere in between is valid!

The §aCleanroom§r multiblock is hollow because you put machines in it to run any recipe that requires a Cleanroom - for example, the §5EV Circuit§r requires the §bCircuit Assembler§r §ninside§r the Cleanroom
Don't forget the §eEnergy Hatch§r, §eMaintenance Hatch§r, and §eIron Door§r!
You §ndon't need§r §6Passthrough Hatches§r if you can figure out wireless transfer
§3Diodes§r are necessary if you are using §9Generators§r for your EU needs because a Generator is too dirty to go into a Cleanroom
You §ndon't need§r Diodes if you use §cEnergy Converters§r because an Energy Converter is... clean?
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.castingMolds.1: This machine also uses Casting Molds to form the fluids into different shapes
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.catalyst.1: A catalyst is needed for this process.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.catalyst.2: The Catalyst will ensure that each operation is able to properly complete. They will also be used in the creation of the controller for the Multiblock
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.centrifugeBlurb: Oh come on, you saw that coming. Of course Im going to add a blurb saying "You spin me Right Round..." for the centrifuge! Who wouldnt?!?!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.centrifugeTrini: Use the Centrifuge to spin the §cTrinium Sulfide§r out of the §2Impure Enriched Naquadah solution§r.
There are 2 other processing methods, but neither of them produce Trinium, which is a vital resource in moving through the ZPM Tier.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.centrifugeUsage: The centrifuge lets you separate compounds into their respective materials by spinning very fast
The Fusion Reactors require some strong materials to contain the immense heat and reactions happening inside of them.
Thats why they make an incredibly suitable material for us to use in crafting the GregStar to ensure Strength and Durability of the star!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.changeUp.1: If we take the Fiber Reinforced Circuit Boards we made in the LuV tier, and change the recipe a bit, we can create a Multi-Layered Fiber Reinforced Circuit Board
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cheaperCircuits: I know, this is an LV machine in the MV age, but trust me, it is worth the MV circuits it takes to craft this
Circuits become cheaper to craft with the Circuit Assembler, and you will need a lot of circuits
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cheaperEVProces: Cheaper EV Processors? Sure Ill take that!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cheaperIVTier.1: Cheaper IV tier as well?! This just keeps getting better!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cheapestLVCircu: Finally, with this you have achieved the cheapest LV circuit - congrats!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.checkEBF.1: Double check you §l§n§cdon't§r§r§r have the §aEBF§r set to §bProgram 1§r, or else it can start cooking the Silicon dust into ingots
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chemicalBathUsa: The §eChemical Bath§r is used in §aOre Processing§r lines to get certain §dbyproducts§r by washing crushed ores in mercury or sodium persulfate
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chemicalReactIn: §eChemical React§r that §dIndium Concentrate§r with §bAluminum Dust§r to get §3Small Pile of Indium Dust§r
Then you can either manually craft 4 of those into one §3Indium Dust§r or automate it with a §ePacker§r on §aProgram 1§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chemicalReactio: All that is left to do is use a §eChemical Reaction§r to pull the Chlorine off the Iridium!
§bPotassium dust§r you can get by making tiny piles of the stuff from the salt water with ghast tears in a §eChemical Reactor§r recipe
This is the last §eChemical Reaction§r in this chain, ultimately for the coveted §dLaminated Glass§r
§eChemical react§r some sodium dust and potassium dust together to get... sodium potassium
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chemicalReactor: Oxygen and sulfur dust in your §eChemical Reactor§r on §aprogram 2§r will make some sulfur dioxide
If you're having trouble keeping up with the sulfur requirements, you could start centrifuging 2 blaze powder to make sulfur dust
As you make this, keep in mind that Chemical Reactor recipes can be generalized to §d3 Input Hatches§r, §53 Output Hatches§r, §e1 Input Bus§r, and §61 Output Bus§r
After making a lot of PTFE, finally, the §aLarge Chemical Reactor§r is ready to rumble!
You'll find that some chemical reactions can only be done in an §aLCR§r, specifically the chemicals needed in making §3Polybenzimidazole§r (PBI for short)
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chlorineSources: Chlorine comes from many sources! To name a few, you could §eelectrolyze§r sodalite, rock salt, salt dust, apatite dust, or regular old salt water
If you go the salt water route, you may wonder how to get salt water - look no further! If you have a steady supply of §dghast tears§r, you can §echemical react§r them with water
Alternatively, a §emixer§r with salt dust and water will also produce salt water, but at that point you might as well §eelectrolyze§r the salt dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chlorobenzene.1: Chlorine and Benzene in a §eChemical Reactor§r on §aProgram 1§r will make you §2Chlorobenzene§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chloroform.1: §3Chlorine§r and §cMethane§r together in a §eChemical Reactor§r on §aProgram 1§r makes §5Chloroform§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.chromiumDustAcq: This machine is very useful for acquiring §dchromium dust§r, which we'll need to make §bstainless steel dust§r and §bvanadium steel dust§r
You could chain process Redstone Dust for Ruby Dust to then §eElectrolyze§r for §dChromium Dust§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.circuitAssemble: We cant leave the ever important Circuit Assembler out, could we?? Of course this multiblock will help to make sure you can keep making all those important circuits.
Thus letting you to continue to expand your Factory and make it to the end!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.circuitProgramm: Many machines use a programmed circuit setting to determine what recipes can be processed
You'll find the option to change the programmed circuit setting in the machine's GUI, just select the program that corresponds to the recipe you are running and it will start running
You don't need to craft a programmed circuit
Often it is easier to dedicate a machine to a specific program setting and make a new one rather than change program settings manually for different crafting recipes
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.circuitsGalore: For now we get 2 of these, but with a few advancements in the next tier up, we can get 4 IV Processors per set of crafting items! Worth!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.clayProcessingL: At least making this stuff doesn't ruin the bucket or mixer
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cleanRoomUpgrad: Lets add another clean room to our arsenal! Except this one will not only ensure the room is clean, it will sterilize the environment.
We will be able to work with Organic Material in our clean room and we wont have to worry about contaminants!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cleanroomFilter: Filter Casings are necessary to actually filter out bad particulates from the air and make the room §eclean§r
When building your cleanroom, use a §awrench§r to break these otherwise they will not drop when broken
All of the ceiling needs to be Filter Casings, minus 1 for where the Cleanroom controller block goes
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cleanroomRequir: Our Cleanrooms have to be spotless, and not a single piece of dust inside. But what if we needed a cleaner, more sterile, environment?
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.coalDust.1: Use a §aMortar§r on some coal to get coal dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.coalDust.2: Put your coal dust through the §eCentrifuge§r to get carbon dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.coalDust.3: Use that Centrifuge again, with glass dust this time, to get silicon dioxide dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cobaltiteDust.1: Cobaltite dust can come from ore processing cobaltite
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cobaltiteDust.2: You can find Cobaltite Ore by mining in the Overworld between -10 and 60, it should be mixed in with Garnierite, Nickel, and Pentlandite ores
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.coils16.1: Making 16 coils may be a tall order. But a necessary one for the GregStar!
The need for Coils is never ending. While we may not be utilizing these in a multiblock, you can be assured they are going to a good source.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.collagen: Collagen is the primary building block of your body's skin, muscles, bones, tendons and ligaments, and other connective tissues.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.compexEnergy: I am sure that  you now see why these plates will be vital. But as you already know, they will provide a great benefit.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.completeABS.1: Complete an Alloy Blast Smelter and assemble the Multiblock Structure.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.complexAlloy.1: Again we visit yet another very complex Alloy.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.complexAlloy.2: But as weve seen with other complex alloys, they are always extremeley beneficial to us, though complicated. This one is no different.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.complexIngot.1: This is one complex ingot. We have many different metals mixed into this alloy. But for good reason.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.complexIngot.2: With this ingot, now we can make some high tier components!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.complexNaquadah: You read that right. This is a 16A UHV Energy Hatch. 4x the potencey of the 4A Energy Hatch.
And it provides all the overclocking you could dream of!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.coolHotIngot.1: That is one hot ingot! Cool it off in your §aVacuum Freezer§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.coolHotIngot.2: Requires those Kanthal Coil Blocks on your §aEBF§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.coolingAlloys: Now we are producing some complex Naquadah. Just like all the other complex resources we are working on, this one provides a significant benefit to the factor.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.copperIngotCraf: One §6Copper Ingot§r and four §cRedstone Dust§r in the §eAlloy Smelter§r creates this lovely ingot
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.costReduction: Lets make a bunch of these Yttrium Barium Cuprate Bolts, as we can utilize them to significantly reduce the cost of our IV Processors!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cpuChip.1: §eCut§r that wafer into a proper chip
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cracker: The §aCracker§r doesn't get you oil, but it does allow for processing the byproducts more efficiently!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.creativeChemica: The Micro Universe Orb requires a lot of power to operate. This power needs to be concentrated to best utilize it for the operations.
To achieve this, the structure needs Focus Lenses.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.crtTelevisions: Does anyone remember those old CRT televisions anymore? Those things used vacuum tubes
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.crushingAndGrin: You can turn plant matter into plant balls, those may come in handy later
You can also take wood dust and compress it into wooden plates
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.crystalCpus: Once you have some Raw Crystal chips, run them through an EBF with Emerald Plates, and you can pick up your Crystal CPU's!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.crystalMainfram: We have been waiting a while for this one.
But that makes the LuV Tier Circuit Assembler just that much more valuable!
And now we can utilize it to make our next tier of Circuits! Did someone say... Progress??
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.crystalProcesso: Weve made it to Crystal Processors, and now have UV tier processors!
So much progress has been made, but were not done yet. Keep on going!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cutterEngraving: Wafers and Silicon Boules need to be cut. This cutter, paired with the Engraving Laser will make sure we keep our stock of Chips up!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cutterUpgrade.1: Make an LuV tier or higher Cutter.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cutterUpgrade.2: While not directly necessary for the recipe, it will speed up the cutting process, which is notorious for not being the fastest process.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cuttingChips: That wafer needs to be cut into chips now, so back to the Cutter with these
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cuttingEdge.1: Turn blocks into plates with this one trick!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cuttingEdge.2: Also very useful for making silicon wafers and wafer chips, which we'll get into shortly
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.cyanDyeProducti: A little sulfuric acid with cyan dye and 2 salt dust will make the liquid cyan dye
Don't worry, I won't make you grab a bucket of the stuff
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.demonCoreHistor: The Demon Core was an item that was the epicenter for one of the quickest (in time of reaction) nuclear accidents to happen. The Demon core was manufactured by the Manhattan Project during World War II and the intent was to use it to learn more about Nuclear Radiation and Moderation.

The core iteself was made of Plutonium, but the 2 hemispheres that surrounded the core were made of a Neutron Moderator, Beryllium. Beryllium is an attractive material for Neutrons and reduces the energy of Neutrons.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.dimethylbenzene: You can choose to either acquire §3Napthalene§r or §2Dimethylbenzene,§r both have their merits
One route that avoids the §aPyrolyse Oven§r could be to use §0Charcoal§r with an §eExtractor§r to make §8Wood Tar§r and §aDistill§r that into §2Dimethylbenzene§r
But really you'd be better off making the §aPyrolyse Oven§r and burning logs or coal and §aDistilling§r the outputs
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.diodeReach.1: Finally, the diode is within reach
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.diodeReach.2: You'll need to turn this into small piles of gallium arsenide dust, or set up a recipe to do that for you
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.dioriteDustProc: Centrifuge the diorite dust to get clay dust and mirabilite dust
The mirabilite can be saved for later processing, if you like
The next step just uses clay dust, so you'll have to do something with that mirabilite dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.dishesPlating.1: There is going to be a lot of Trinaquah being made.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.dishesPlating.2: Figuring out how to optimize the process for speed and efficiency will probably be necessary.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.distillationTow: The §aDistillation Tower§r serves as the foundation for §dOil Processing§r which can turn oil into many more useful forms
When building the Tower, you will need it to be §c1 + Fluid Outputs tall§r to process recipes correctly
§eFor example§r, if the recipe you want to run outputs 5 fluids, then your tower must be at least 6 tall with 5 output hatches
The max size is a 3x3x13 structure
§bRemember:§r For how to build multiblocks, look at the uses of the multiblock controller in JEI for the §3Multiblock Info§r page
How you get the oil is left up to you! A couple options are outlined in the quests below
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.distillingWater: Nothing special to see here. Just Distilling some water.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.distillsCompoun: Distills compounds into other substances - note the programmed circuit setting for the available recipes
There is a Distillation Tower, but we will get into that later on
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.distinctBuses: Now, having a multiblock, we can set "Distinct Buses" and set each one to do a specific mold and or Programmed Circuit! We now have an all in one machine!!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.doNotTouch: I promise, this is not something you want to touch or get on your skin...
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.doubleItUp: Double Tungstensteel plating will make for a very durable Star. Maybe this is where it gets its Robustness from.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.duraniumMix.1: With a name like Duranium, I would hope this element is Durable.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.duraniumMix.2: Anyways, we need to mix this and Titanium together. The resulting material is going to be VERY strong!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfAndChemicalB: Cook the dust up in the §aEBF§r and cool it down in the §eChemical Bath§r
That's right, two §eEBF§r coil upgrades in one chapter!
You'll have to make these coils to smelt the High Speed Steel S and E variants for the Advanced SMD Components
§l§eNote:§r§r Making the Advanced SMD Components is not strictly necessary to make the Nanoprocessors
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfMultiblock.1: Gather the listed materials and then check JEI's Multiblock Info page to see how to build it
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfMultiblock.2: Each LV Energy Hatch accepts 2 Amps of LV. Together that makes 4 Amps of LV, which in this case will allow the EBF to process MV recipes as if it were powered by 1 Amp of MV!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfMultiblock.3: The Multiblock Info page shows one possible configuration of the multiblock, but often it is not the desired configuration. Be sure to check which blocks are valid at the various positions
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfMultiblock.4: You'll know it is formed when the input and output blocks change color to match the controller and casings
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfTemperature: With 16 of these on your §eElectric Blast Furnace§r you can cook recipes up to §c4500 Kelvin§r! That's 4227 Celsius or 7640 Fahrenheit!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfUpgrade.2: This will allow us to smelt higher tier ingots, like HV Superconducting metal!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ebfUpgrades: Yet again, we revisit the EBF's and upgrade the coils, a necessary process so that we can process metals and alloys through the EBF's.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.edgeOfTechnolog: We are at the edge of Technology, and now we need to utilize Crystal Chip's to make some new Processors!!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.electricalSafet: At §5EV§r we're dealing with more than 1000 Volts! We're practically electrical linemen, just please don't try this at home
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.electrolyzeClay: Finally, it is time to electrolyze the clay dust and get that sweet, sweet aluminium dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.electrolyzerOpe: The electrolyzer will separate compounds into constituent compounds based on their electric charge
In our case, it will separate the §dArsenic Trioxide§r into §eArsenic§r and §bOxygen§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.electrolyzersIm: Electrolyzers are important, but they are also small, and we use them for quite a few processing lines.
Why not let this multiblock handle all of those needs moving forwards, and parallelize it so you can run more processes in 1 machine?!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.electrotineCrea: If you cannot find §belectrotine§r in the Nether, you can create it by mixing electrum and redstone in a §eMixer§r on §aProgram 1§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.electrumFoil.1: Another §eChemical Reactor§r recipe, this time using §6Electrum Foil§r and either §9Sodium Persulfate§r or §0Iron III Chloride§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.emeraldLens: Process one of those emerald plates in a Lathe to get your Emerald Lens!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.emeraldPlates.1: Use the cutter with a block of emerald to get emerald plates
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.emeraldProcessi: Process §aRaw Emerald§r or silk-touched §aNether Emerald Ore§r through a Macerator, then Ore Washer the crushed ore, then start §esifting§r the purified ore for §bExquisite§r or §bFlawless§r gems
It does have to be GregTech's emerald ore, you can't use regular silk-touched emerald ore for this
§e§lHint:§r To find GregTech™ emeralds, look for §dberyllium§r in the Nether §cbetween y=5 and y=30§r, or you can check the Mining Dimension in the netherrack layer!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.emittersSensors: The Emitters and Sensors for each tier always seem to be the hardest components to make. But they always end up helping us in the end with the machines they construct. So its worth it in the end.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energiumBattery: §cEnergium Dust§r inside an §6HV Autoclave§r will make an §bEnergium Battery§r
Energium Batteries hold up to §a10 minutes§r of HV power
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energyConversio: Keep in mind that §e4 RF : 1 EU§r conversion factor! We're at 512 EU at HV, so 2048 RF
Some recipes will use all of that per tick to process, so make sure your energy production can keep up!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energyHatch.1: Keep in mind, each Energy Hatch can accept 2 Amps of power
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energyHatch.2: Many machines accept two (or more) Energy Hatches, which means you can feed 4 Amps in and unlock processing at a higher voltage tier!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energyHatchUpgr: §l§6Remember§r: Each of these can accept 2 Amps, so if you have two of these Energy Hatches on a multiblock you can actually tier up to §dLuV§r!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energyMeasureme: Energy in GT is measured in Energy Units (EU)
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energyProductio: You can produce energy in GT which will naturally be in EU, or you can choose to make energy with another mod like Powah and convert it to EU (more on that later)
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energySetup.1: Do you already have a setup for RF/FE power generation?
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energySetup.2: In that instance, you could make Energy Converters to turn that RF into EU and cable this to your machines
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energySetup.3: By default it is set to convert EU to RF, so you will need to thwack it with a soft mallet to change it to RF to EU conversion
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energySetup.4: The red side is the EU side and the green sides are for RF/FE. Keep in mind you can rotate the converter by crouch right clicking with a wrench
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energySetup.5: Note: Use wirecutters to enable and disable wire connections to blocks and each other
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energySourceSwi: At some point you will probably want to switch off of steam to producing Benzene or High Octane Gasoline and gas or combustion generators
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.energyUtilizati: Energy utilization is measured in EU/t
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.engravingLaserM: Our next tier of processors have as heavy reliance on Chip. As such, the Engraving Laser multiblock wil be working overtime to make sure that SOC's, CPU's and RAM stay in abundant supply. This machine is here to help and ensure we stay ahead of the curve!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.engravingPatter: Uses a laser and specific lenses to engrave different patterns on the wafers
You might want to make one of these per lens we make, so you don't have to change out the lenses manually when automating
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.engravingWafers: Engraved wafers need to be cut into the appropriate size, so back to the Cutter we go!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epicShip: While we wont necessarily be utilizing this ship immediately, it would be better to get it crafted now, and have it on stand by for when we are ready to use it.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epichlorohydrin: There is an alternate recipe that uses Allyl Chloride and Hypochlorous Acid, if you so choose to go that route
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epoxy.1: Sodium Hydroxide Dust is useful yet again! §eChemical React§r it with the Epichlorohydrin and Bisphenol A to make liquid Epoxy
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epoxy.2: You can then §eFluid Solidify§r the Epoxy into plates directly
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epoxy.3: We'll use these as a base for the §bNanoprocessor§r circuit boards
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epoxy.5: Acetone, Phenol, and Hydrochloric Acid come together in the §eChemical Reactor§r on §aProgram 1§r to make this
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epoxyCircuitBoa: That's right, another recipe for the §eChemical Reactor§r
500mB Sulfuric Acid + 8 Gold Foil + Epoxy Sheet = 1 Epoxy Circuit Board
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.epoxyReinforcem: Lets take the Epoxy from the IV tier and make some reinforcements for our next tier Processors!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ethanol.1: Distilling biomass results in ethanol, which is alcohol, but don't tell anyone I told you
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ethylene.1: Ethanol + Sulfuric Acid in a §eChemical Reactor§r makes Ethylene
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ethylene.2: There are other methods of course, but those involve petrochemistry which we aren't getting into quite yet
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.evAssemblerSetu: If you didn't make the §5EV Assembler§r before now, then now is the time to do it!
You'll use this to make the §9Tungstensteel Coil§r for your §aEBF§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.evCircuitAssemb: The EV Circuit Assembler, the next major step in making higher tier circuits and making lower tier circuits even cheaper!
You've still got a ways to go with fluids before you make the §3Nanoprocessor§r tier of circuits
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.evCircuits: Cheaper EV circuits! Don't forget to update your recipes!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.exchangers.1: You are going to need quite a bit of this as a catalyst in the Star Forge in order to craft the GregStar.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.exchangers.2: Make sure you have 10 buckets available.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.exquisiteEmeral: Get together a dozen or so of these Exquisite Emeralds, as they will help immensely in these next few steps.
You can use an Extractor to get glass in a liquid state for making the diode
We'll get to polyethylene later on, so keep in mind that you can upgrade this recipe!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.extruders.1: Extruders force ingots into various shapes with the use of the extruder mold
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.extruders.2: It is often cheaper to use the extruder to make crafting components like rotors for example
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.ferriteIngot.1: Two buckets of §boxygen§r plus the §bferrite mixture dust§r in your §eElectric Blast Furnace§r gets you the ingot - no cooling necessary!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.finalCircuitBoa: This will be the final Circuit Board we need to build our Final Tier of processors.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.finalPTFE.1: §eChemical React§r that §aTetrafluoroethylene§r with a little Air or better yet, §bOxygen Gas§r, to receive the final product of §6Polytetrafluoroethylene§r!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.finalPTFE.2: Finally, PTFE! This forms as the basis for making Chemically Inert Casings, which we'll use shortly to make the §aLarge Chemical Reactor§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.finalPTFE.3: Once you have the §aLCR§r you can also make more PTFE at a time by adding in some §cTitanium Tetrachloride§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.finalSetProcess: This is the First of our final set of Processors!
While we cant yet utilize the best recipe for this processor (The best one returns 4 processors) we will be able to use it soon, once we unlock the UV Circuit Assembler in the next section.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.fineWire.1: Refine the wire 1 more time, and we will have the Fine wire we need for the ZPM Field Generator.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.fineWire.2: Unfortunately, we will need quite a bit of Fine wire, so keep processing!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.finish.2: Now we have our Multi-Layered Fiber Reinforced Printed Circuit Boards, and we can directly use them in our next Tier of Processors!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.firstCover.1: Our first cover! Covers alter the behavior of machines in a multitude of ways, but this isn't the place to get into all of that
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.firstCover.2: The §arobot arm§r cover will allow you to export (by default) or import items into a machine. In this case, using that buffer chest/barrel from before, you can import specifically diorite dust
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.firstCover.3: Why is this LV when we're in MV? Well, because it is cheaper to make and covers don't explode despite the voltage difference
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.firstTierHSS.1: The first tier of §3High Speed Steel§r, you'll end up making a LOT of this stuff as it serves as the base for the other variants of HSS Dusts
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.fluidDrillingRi: Slap one of these down and start drilling! This will unearth the ancient oils from beneath the crust of bedrock
You can coat wires using very little of this, and it will come in handy later on when making higher tier conveyor modules
This is where the §aCracker§r comes in handy, as it doesn't lose any of your hard earned Naphtha when cracking
An alternative is to use a §eChemical Reactor§r, but that loses half the Naphtha!
You probably want to make another §aDistillation Tower§r to distill this
§eChemical React§r the §6Sulfuric Naphtha§r with §9Hydrogen§r to rid it of the sulfur
Distilling §bRaw Oil§r results in the most §eSulfuric Naphtha§r, but you can get it from the other oil types too
Ah, this brings me back, it's almost like we're back in the Steam Age
This gets us more steam than those boilers did though
A little §9water§r on §aProgram 1§r with this will get you plenty of §7Steam§r
The majority of what you'll find with this is §eRaw Oil§r, but you can also find Natural Gas and other oil variants! You can use the §6HV Prospector§r in §bFluid Mode§r to determine what lies beneath
Do keep in mind, the oils in the chunk will deplete over time, so you will need to move the Fluid Drilling Rig occasionally
§aDistill§r your §eLightly Steam Cracked Naphtha§r to acquire §0Benzene§r
§aDistill§r your §eLightly Steam Cracked Naphtha§r to acquire §6Butadiene§r
Benzene + Ethylene in a §eChemical Reactor§r will result in §bStyrene§r
Styrene + Butadiene + Oxygen or Air in a §eChemical Reactor§r gets you the raw dust of the highest tier of rubber available
It is recommended you use Oxygen rather than Air here, as you get the most that way
Finally, the highest tier of rubber, §dStyrene Butadiene Rubber§r
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.fluidFinder.1: Looking for fluids to unearth? This prospector has a fluid mode to help with just such a task!
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.fluidHeaters: Make any IV Tier and up Fluid Heater so that we can process that Raw Growth Medium we made.
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.fluidIngotProce: This machine will turn ingots into their fluid form
It can also process some items into pulp, like sticky resin into raw rubber pulp
i18n.quest.gregtech.desc.fluorineGas.1: My favorite source of Fluorine Gas? Easy, §eElectrolyzing§r §2Fluorite Dust§r
